overview: The DC Mountain lab, located outside Park City in Utahâ€™s Wasatch Mountains, is the place where the DC team and friends test product, shoot films, and just plain ride. It is strictly off-limits to the public, though, so few have ever gotten a glimpse beyond the Mtn. Lab gates... until now. Filmed primarily at the Mountain Lab during winter 2005, the Mtn. Lab DVD captures a typical day at the lab with the DC team and friends, and features action footage of the entire DC team.
title: DC MTN LAB
